thread.title: Customer Ms C Bautista
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer Ms C Bautista

author: Customer Ms C Bautista
title: Customer Ms C Bautista
text:
Everything seems to be okay. I have not driven car yet since tyre fitting.
I had to comment that the email information from tyresonthedrive states my car mileage 8600 in error, when I told him that mileage is 86000.
I want to make it clear that I gave correct information.
